author: Special Correspondent
title: COVID-19 | Sorry for bringing virus home, says Arunachal patient who returned from Nizamuddin
description: The man in early 20s and his family are being attacked on social media; He thinks he might not be welcome at Medo in Lohit district where he has been living for more than two decades
content:
Arunachal Pradeshs lone COVID-19 positive patient has said he feels sorry for unwittingly bringing the virus home and sad that he and his family were being attacked on social media.
He is worried that he might not be welcome at Medo in Lohit district in Arun… [+2198 chars]
